description:
The Offset Zeros will go places where your Friends won't go. They have narrow heads, perfect for thin or shallow cracks, pockets and pin scars found on hard aid or free routes. The extendable slings reduce the likelihood of walking and let you protect wandery routes with fewer draws. Set includes each size of Offset Zero cam.

  • Spring armor over cable protects stem from abrasion while keeping it flexible
  • Extendable Dyneema sling allows you to carry fewer quickdraws
  • Narrow head width fits in small pods or shallow cracks
  • Thumb loop for confident trigger use
  • Slings and cams are colour-coded for orderly racking and quick selection
  • Includes .1/.2, .2/.3, .3/.4, .4/.5, and .5/.75 Offset Zero Friend
name: Wild Country Offset Zero Friend Cam Set
